name: Urchin  ±
ability: If you would die at night, you instead become the good character you were mad as (if any).
flavor: I'm gonna grow up to be just like you!
otherNightReminder: If the Urchin died tonight, if they were mad as another good character, wake them and show them the YOU ARE info token and that character token.

name: Tombcrawler  ±
ability: The first executed evil lives but registers as dead. 1 good player knows a Tombcrawler is in play.
flavor: And so his tomb was engraved: "Don't bug me, I'm trying to sleep!"

jinxes.reason: The Zombuul doesn't count towards evil executions.
